code: import{useState}from"react";import{updateAccount}from"../api";import Account from"../components/Account";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Deposit(_ref){let{allAccounts,getAllAccounts}=_ref;const handleDeposit=async(value,balance,id)=>{const depositAmount=parseFloat(value);const newBalance=parseFloat(balance);const total=depositAmount+newBalance;await updateAccount(id,total.toFixed(2));getAllAccounts();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Account,{title:"Deposit",buttonText:"Deposit",inputLabel:"Deposit Amount",onSubmit:handleDeposit,allAccounts:allAccounts});}
